A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Social justice litered throughout\, not to mention a shoddy story full of plot holes that is inexcusable for a movie of this budget and caliber. The movie intentionally messes with the viewer\, more preoccupied with \"gotcha games\" than story cohesion. The special effects are good\, but if you paid more attention to the story like I did\, you'll quickly forget the tired nostalgic coat of paint on this disgrace of a film.  I've never been upset by movies\, not the prequels\, not the transformers movies. This is the first movie I truly hate. I'd give it 1/2 a star\, but RT doesn't count those.
